newsArray.title: Arsenal ready to offer 11-goal target wages of €115k-a-week in order to lure him
creator: Saikat Chatterjee
newsArray.description: Arsenal are keen on improving their attacking options with the signing of Joshua Zirkzee. The 22-year-old Bologna striker has been linked with a move away from Italy and Arsenal are keen on securing his services. A report from Calciomercato claims that Arsenal are willing to offer him a contract worth around €6 million (roughly €115k-a-week) in […] The post Arsenal ready to offer 11-goal target wages of €115k-a-week in order to lure him appeared first on CaughtOffside.

newsArray.title: Soccer-West Ham's Earthy discharged from hospital after head injury
newsArray.description: (Reuters) - West Ham United midfielder George Earthy has been discharged from hospital after sustaining a head injury during their 2-0 defeat by Fulham in the Premier League, the club said on Monday. Read full story

creator: Nathan Jahnke
